meanings.sent5: She softly kaddishes, her voice trembling with emotion as she remembers her father.

meanings.definition: Kaddishes: recites the Kaddish prayer for the deceased
meanings.sent1: The cantor kaddishes beautifully, bringing comfort to the grieving family.
meanings.sent2: Each year, the community gathers to kaddishes for all those who have passed on.
